This class will coordinate between agency operators, refreshment points, and banner validation, implementing the main insertion flow with error handling and confirmation logic.\n\n```\npackage com.etur.insertbanner;\n\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.UUID;\nimport java.util.Scanner;\n\n/**\n * BannerManager class handles the core business logic for inserting banners.\n * Coordinates between agency operators, refreshment points, and banner validation.\n * Implements the main insertion flow with error handling and confirmation logic.\n */\npublic class BannerManager {\n    private List<RefreshmentPoint> refreshmentPoints;\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for BannerManager.\n     * Initializes with empty refreshment points list and no current operator.\n     */\n    public BannerManager() {\n        this.refreshmentPoints = new ArrayList<>();\n        this.currentOperator = null;\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Sets the current agency operator for banner operations.\n     * \n     * @param operator The logged-in agency operator\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if operator is null or not logged in\n     */\n    public void setCurrentOperator(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Operator cannot be null");\n        }\n        \n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("Operator must be logged in");\n        }\n        \n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        System.out.println("Current operator set to: " + operator.getUsername());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a refreshment point to the manager\'s list.\n     * \n     * @param point The refreshment point to add\n     */\n    public void addRefreshmentPoint(RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        if (point != null && !refreshmentPoints.contains(point)) {\n            refreshmentPoints.add(point);\n            \n            // Also add to operator\'s managed points if operator is set\n            if (currentOperator != null) {\n                currentOperator.addManagedRefreshmentPoint(point.getId());\n            }\n            \n            System.out.println("Refreshment point added: " + point.getName());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets a list of all refreshment points available for banner insertion.\n     * \n     * @return List of refreshment points\n     */\n    public List<RefreshmentPoint> getRefreshmentPoints() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(refreshmentPoints);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Executes the main banner insertion flow according to the use case.\n     * This is the core method that implements the use case steps.\n     * \n     * @return true if banner was successfully inserted, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean executeInsertBannerFlow() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Starting Insert Banner Use Case ===\\n");\n        \n        // Step 1: Check entry conditions\n        if (!checkEntryConditions()) {\n            System.out.println("Entry conditions not met. Cannot proceed with banner insertion.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 2: Display list of refreshment points and select one\n        RefreshmentPoint selectedPoint = selectRefreshmentPoint();\n        if (selectedPoint == null) {\n            System.out.println("No refreshment point selected. Operation cancelled.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 3: Display form for image selection and get banner data\n        Banner newBanner = getBannerDataFromUser(selectedPoint.getId());\n        if (newBanner == null) {\n            System.out.println("Banner data collection cancelled.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 4: Validate banner and check refreshment point capacity\n        if (!validateBannerAndCapacity(newBanner, selectedPoint)) {\n            System.out.println("Banner validation failed. Cannot proceed.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 5: Ask for confirmation\n        if (!askForConfirmation(newBanner, selectedPoint)) {\n            System.out.println("Insertion cancelled by operator.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 6: Insert the banner\n        boolean success = insertBanner(newBanner, selectedPoint);\n        \n        if (success) {\n            System.out.println("\\n=== Banner Insertion Completed Successfully ===\\n");\n            sendNotification(selectedPoint, newBanner);\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("\\n=== Banner Insertion Failed ===\\n");\n        }\n        \n        return success;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks the entry conditions for the use case.\n     * According to use case: "Entry Operator conditions: The agency has logged."\n     * \n     * @return true if all entry conditions are met, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean checkEntryConditions() {\n        System.out.println("Checking entry conditions...");\n        \n        // Check 1: Operator must be set and logged in\n        if (currentOperator == null) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: No agency operator is set.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        if (!currentOperator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Agency operator is not logged in.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 2: Operator session must be valid\n        if (!currentOperator.isSessionValid()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Operator session is not valid or has expired.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 3: Operator must have INSERT_BANNER permission\n        if (!currentOperator.hasPermission("INSERT_BANNER")) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Operator does not have INSERT_BANNER permission.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 4: Check server connection (ETOUR server)\n        if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 5: Must have at least one refreshment point\n        if (refreshmentPoints.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: No refreshment points available.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("All entry conditions are satisfied.");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Displays a list of refreshment points and allows the operator to select one.\n     * Implements step 1 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @return The selected refreshment point, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private RefreshmentPoint selectRefreshmentPoint() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select Refreshment Point ---");\n        System.out.println("Available refreshment points:");\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < refreshmentPoints.size(); i++) {\n            RefreshmentPoint point = refreshmentPoints.get(i);\n            System.out.printf("%d. %s - %s, %s (Banners: %d/%d)%n",\n                    i + 1,\n                    point.getName(),\n                    point.getAddress(),\n                    point.getCity(),\n                    point.getBannerCount(),\n                    point.getMaximumBanners());\n        }\n        \n        System.out.print("\\nEnter the number of the refreshment point (or 0 to cancel): ");\n        \n        try {\n            int choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine().trim());\n            \n            if (choice == 0) {\n                System.out.println("Selection cancelled by operator.");\n                return null;\n            }\n            \n            if (choice < 1 || choice > refreshmentPoints.size()) {\n                System.out.println("Invalid selection. Please try again.");\n                return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\n            }\n            \n            RefreshmentPoint selectedPoint = refreshmentPoints.get(choice - 1);\n            \n            // Check if operator can manage this refreshment point\n            if (!currentOperator.canManageRefreshmentPoint(selectedPoint.getId())) {\n                System.out.println("ERROR: You are not authorized to manage this refreshment point.");\n                return null;\n            }\n            \n            System.out.println("Selected: " + selectedPoint.getName());\n            return selectedPoint;\n            \n        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n            System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a number.");\n            return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Displays a form for image selection and collects banner data from the user.\n     * Implements steps 2-3 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param refreshmentPointId The ID of the selected refreshment point\n     * @return A Banner object with the collected data, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private Banner getBannerDataFromUser(String refreshmentPointId) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2-3: Banner Image Selection ---");\n        \n        System.out.println("Please enter banner details:");\n        \n        // Get image name\n        System.out.print("Image file name (e.g., banner.jpg): ");\n        String imageName = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (imageName.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("Image name cannot be empty.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Get image path\n        System.out.print("Image file path (e.g., /images/banners/): ");\n        String imagePath = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (imagePath.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("Image path cannot be empty.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Get image size\n        long imageSize = 0;\n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Image size in bytes (e.g., 204800 for 200KB): ");\n            String sizeInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                imageSize = Long.parseLong(sizeInput);\n                if (imageSize <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println("Image size must be positive.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // Get image dimensions\n        int width = 0;\n        int height = 0;\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Image width in pixels (e.g., 800): ");\n            String widthInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                width = Integer.parseInt(widthInput);\n                if (width <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println("Width must be positive.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Image height in pixels (e.g., 600): ");\n            String heightInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                height = Integer.parseInt(heightInput);\n                if (height <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println("Height must be positive.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // Create banner object\n        String bannerId = UUID.randomUUID().toString();\n        Banner banner = new Banner(bannerId, imagePath, imageName, imageSize, refreshmentPointId);\n        banner.setImageDimensions(width, height);\n        \n        System.out.println("Banner data collected successfully.");\n        return banner;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Validates the banner and checks if the refreshment point has capacity.\n     * Implements step 4 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to validate\n     * @param point The refreshment point to check capacity for\n     * @return true if validation passes, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean validateBannerAndCapacity(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Banner Validation and Capacity Check ---");\n        \n        // Check 1: Validate banner image\n        System.out.println("Validating banner image...");\n        if (!banner.validateImage()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Banner image validation failed.");\n            System.out.println(banner.getValidationDetails());\n            triggerErroredUseCase(banner);\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Banner image validation passed.");\n        \n        // Check 2: Check refreshment point capacity\n        System.out.println("Checking refreshment point capacity...");\n        if (point.hasReachedMaxBanners()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Refreshment point has reached maximum banner capacity.");\n            System.out.println(point.getBannerStatusSummary());\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Capacity check passed. " + point.getRemainingBannerSlots() + " slots available.");\n        \n        // Check 3: Verify server connection again (ETOUR server)\n        if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted during validation.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Asks the operator for confirmation before inserting the banner.\n     * Implements part of step 4 and step 5 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to insert\n     * @param point The refreshment point where banner will be inserted\n     * @return true if operator confirms, false if cancels\n     */\n    private boolean askForConfirmation(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Insertion Confirmation ---");\n        \n        System.out.println("\\nPlease review the banner details:");\n        System.out.println("Refreshment Point: " + point.getName());\n        System.out.println("Image Name: " + banner.getImageName());\n        System.out.println("Image Size: " + banner.getImageSize() + " bytes");\n        System.out.println("Image Format: " + banner.getImageFormat());\n        System.out.println("Dimensions: " + banner.getWidth() + "x" + banner.getHeight());\n        System.out.println("Current banners at point: " + point.getBannerCount() + "/" + point.getMaximumBanners());\n        \n        System.out.print("\\nDo you want to insert this banner? (yes/no): ");\n        String response = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n        \n        return response.equals("yes") || response.equals("y");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Inserts the banner into the refreshment point.\n     * Implements step 6 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to insert\n     * @param point The refreshment point where banner will be inserted\n     * @return true if insertion successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean insertBanner(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Banner Insertion ---");\n        \n        try {\n            // Final server connection check\n            if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n                System.out.println("ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted during insertion.");\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // Insert the banner\n            boolean success = point.addBanner(banner);\n            \n            if (success) {\n                System.out.println("Banner inserted successfully!");\n                System.out.println("Banner ID: " + banner.getId());\n                System.out.println("Total banners at " + point.getName() + ": " + point.getBannerCount());\n                \n                // Remember the banner association (implicitly done by addBanner)\n                System.out.println("Banner association with refreshment point recorded.");\n                return true;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("ERROR: Failed to insert banner. Maximum capacity may have been reached.");\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Unexpected error during banner insertion: " + e.getMessage());\n            e.printStackTrace();\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Triggers the Errored use case when banner validation fails.\n     * According to use case: "In the event that the inserted image is not valid, enable the use case Errored."\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner that failed validation\n     */\n    private void triggerErroredUseCase(Banner banner) {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Triggering Errored Use Case ===");\n        System.out.println("Banner validation failed for: " + banner.getImageName());\n        System.out.println("Please check the image characteristics and try again.");\n        System.out.println("Error details have been logged for administrator review.");\n        \n        // In a real application, this would trigger a separate error handling workflow\n        // For this simulation, we just log the error\n        System.out.println("ERROR LOG: Invalid banner attempted - " + banner.toString());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Sends notification about the banner insertion.\n     * According to use case: "The notification about the insertion of new banner to the Refreshments selected."\n     * \n     * @param point The refreshment point where banner was inserted\n     * @param banner The banner that was inserted\n     */\n    private void sendNotification(RefreshmentPoint point, Banner banner) {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Sending Notification ===");\n        System.out.println("Notification sent: New banner has been inserted at " + point.getName());\n        System.out.println("Banner details: " + banner.getImageName() + " (" + banner.getImageFormat() + ")");\n        System.out.println("Refreshment point: " + point.getName() + ", " + point.getAddress());\n        System.out.println("Total banners now: " + point.getBannerCount() + "/" + point.getMaximumBanners());\n        \n        // In a real application, this would send an actual notification (email, message, etc.)\n        System.out.println("Notification has been recorded in the system.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets a refreshment point by its ID.\n     * \n     * @param pointId The ID of the refreshment point\n     * @return The refreshment point if found, null otherwise\n     */\n    public RefreshmentPoint getRefreshmentPointById(String pointId) {\n        for (RefreshmentPoint point : refreshmentPoints) {\n            if (point.getId().equals(pointId)) {\n                return point;\n            }\n        }\n        return null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets a summary of all refreshment points and their banner status.\n     * \n     * @return String containing summary information\n     */\n    public String getRefreshmentPointsSummary() {\n        StringBuilder summary = new StringBuilder();\n        summary.append("Refreshment Points Summary:\\n");\n        summary.append("===========================\\n");\n        \n        if (refreshmentPoints.isEmpty()) {\n            summary.append("No refreshment points available.\\n");\n        } else {\n            for (int i = 0; i < refreshmentPoints.size(); i++) {\n                RefreshmentPoint point = refreshmentPoints.get(i);\n                summary.append(i + 1).append(". ").append(point.getBannerStatusSummary()).append("\\n");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return summary.toString();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Closes the scanner resource.\n     * Should be called when the BannerManager is no longer needed.\n     */\n    public void close() {\n        if (scanner != null) {\n            scanner.close();\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Simulates the complete banner insertion process for testing.\n     * This method provides a test flow without user interaction.\n     * \n     * @param pointId ID of the refreshment point\n     * @param imageName Name of the image\n'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': '\n# Past Experience\n<experience>\n\n# Tool State\nThe current editor state is:\n(Current directory: /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/InsertBanner_1766830362)\n(Open file: None)\n\n# Current Plan\n[GOAL] [Message] from Mike to Alex: Write a complete Java program based on the following use case. point\n170|        if (refreshmentPoints.isEmpty()) {\n171|            System.out.println("ERROR: No refreshment points available.");\n172|            return false;\n173|        }\n174|        \n175|        System.out.println("All entry conditions are satisfied.");\n176|        return true;\n177|    }\n178|    \n179|    /**\n180|     * Displays a list of refreshment points and allows the operator selectRefreshmentPoint() {\n186|        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select Refreshment Point ---");\n187|        System.out.println("Available refreshment points:");\n188|        \n189| ");\n201|        \n202|        try {\n203|            int choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine().trim());\n204|            \n205|            if (choice == 0) {\n206| Please try again.");\n212|                return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\n213|            }\n214|            \n215|            RefreshmentPoint selectedPoint = refreshmentPoints.get(choice - 1);\n216|            \n217|            // Check if operator can manage this refreshment point\n218|            if (!currentOperator.canManageRefreshmentPoint(selectedPoint.getId())) {\n219|                System.out.println("ERROR: You are not authorized to manage this refreshment point.");\n220|                return null;\n221|            }\n222|            \n223|            System.out.println("Selected: " + selectedPoint.getName());\n224|            return selectedPoint;\n225|            \n226|        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n227|            System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a number.");\n228|            return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\n229|        }\n230|    }\n231|    \n232|    /**\n233|     * Displays a form for image selection Please enter a valid number.");\n297|            }\n298|        }\n299|        \n300|        while (true) {\n301|            System.out.print("Image height in pixels (e.g., 600): ");\n302|            String heightInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n303|            \n304|            try {\n305|                height = Integer.parseInt(heightInput);\n306|                if (height <= 0) {\n307|                    System.out.println("Height must be positive.");\n308|                    continue;\n309|                }\n310|                break;\n311|            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n312|                System.out.println("Invalid input. Maximum capacity may have been reached.");\n422|                return false;\n423|            }\n424|            \n425|        } catch (Exception e) {\n426|            System.out.println("ERROR:    private String city;\n    private String agencyId; // ID of the agency that manages this point\n    private int maximumBanners; // Maximum number of banners allowed\n    private List<Banner> banners; // List of associated banners\n    \n    // Default maximum banners if not specified\n    public static final int DEFAULT_MAX_BANNERS = 5;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for creating a new refreshment point with default maximum banners.\n     * \n     * @param name Name of the refreshment point\n     * @param address Address of the refreshment point\n     * @param city City where Name of the refreshment point\n     * @param address Address of the refreshment point\n     * @param city City where the refreshment point is located\n     * @param agencyId ID of the managing agency\n     * @param maximumBanners Maximum number of banners allowed\n     */\n    public RefreshmentPoint(String name, String address, String city, String agencyId, int maximumBanners) {\n        this.id = UUID.randomUUID().toString();\n        this.name = name;\n        this.address = address;\n        this.city = city;\n        this.agencyId = agencyId;\n        this.maximumBanners = maximumBanners > 0 ? maximumBanners : DEFAULT_MAX_BANNERS;\n        this.banners = new ArrayList<>();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks if the refreshment point has reached its maximum banner capacity.\n     * \n     * @return true if maximum banners reached, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean hasReachedMaxBanners() {\n        return banners.size() >= maximumBanners;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets the number of remaining banner slots available.\n     * \n     * @return Number of banners that can still be added\n     */\n    public int getRemainingBannerSlots() {\n        return Math.max(0, maximumBanners - banners.size());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a banner to the refreshment point if capacity allows.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to add\n     * @return true if banner was added successfully, false if maximum reached\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if banner is null or belongs to a different point\n     */\n    public boolean addBanner(Banner banner) {\n        if (banner == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Banner cannot be null");\n        }\n        \n        // Check if banner already belongs to a different refreshment point\n        if (banner.getRefreshmentPointId() != null && !banner.getRefreshmentPointId().equals(this.id)) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Banner belongs to a different refreshment point");\n        }\n        \n        // Update banner\'s refreshment point ID if not set\n        if (banner.getRefreshmentPointId() == null) {\n            banner.setRefreshmentPointId(this.id);\n        }\n        \n        // Check if maximum capacity reached\n        if (hasReachedMaxBanners()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n removed, false if not found\n     */\n    public boolean removeBanner(String bannerId) {\n        for (int i = 0; i < banners.size(); i++) {\n            if (banners.get(i).getId().equals(bannerId)) {\n                banners.remove(i);\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets a banner by its ID.\n     * \n     * @param bannerId ID of the banner to retrieve\n     * @return The banner if found, null otherwise\n     */\n    public Banner getBanner(String bannerId) {\n        for (Banner banner : banners) {\n \n        // If reducing maximum and current banners exceed new maximum,\n        // we don\'t automatically remove banners, but it will prevent new additions\n        this.maximumBanners = new ArrayList<>();\n        this.managedRefreshmentPoints = new ArrayList<>();\n        \n        // Add default permissions for banner insertion\n        addDefaultPermissions();\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds default permissions for an agency operator.\n     */\n    private void addDefaultPermissions() {\n        permissions.add("VIEW_REFRESHMENT_POINTS");\n        permissions.add("SELECT_REFRESHMENT_POINT");\n        permissions.add("INSERT_BANNER");\n        permissions.add("VIEW_BANNERS");\n        permissions.add("VALIDATE_IMAGES");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Attempts to log in the operator with given credentials.\n     * \n     * @param username Operator username\n     * @param password Operator password (in real app, would be encrypted)\n     * @return true if login successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean login(String username, String password) {\n        // In a real application, this would validate against a database\n        // For simulation, we accept any non-empty username and password\n        if (username != null && !username.trim().isEmpty() && \n            password != null && !password.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            \n            // Set login state\n            this.isLoggedIn = true;\n            this.loginTime = LocalDateTime.now();\n            \n            // Update username if different (in case of shared operator object)\n            if (!this.username.equals(username)) {\n                this.username = username;\n            }\n            \n            System.out.println("Operator " + username + " from agency " + agencyName + " logged in successfully.");\n            return true;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Login failed: Invalid credentials.");\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Logs out the operator.\n     */\n    public void logout() {\n        if (isLoggedIn) {\n            System.out.println("Operator " + username + " logged out successfully.");\n            this.isLoggedIn = false;\n            this.loginTime = null;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks if the operator session is still valid (not timed out).\n     * \n     * @return true if session is valid, false if timed out\n     */\n    public boolean isSessionValid() {\n        if (!isLoggedIn || loginTime == null) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        LocalDateTime now = LocalDateTime.now();\n        long minutesSinceLogin = java.time.Duration.between(loginTime, now).toMinutes();\n        \n        if (minutesSinceLogin > SESSION_TIMEOUT_MINUTES) {\n            System.out.println("Session timed out after " + minutesSinceLogin + " minutes.");\n            logout();\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks if the operator has a specific permission.\n     * \n     * @param permission Permission to check\n     * @return true if operator has the permission, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean hasPermission(String permission) {\n        if (!isLoggedIn || !isSessionValid()) {\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return permissions.contains(permission);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a permission to the operator\'s permission list.\n     * \n     * @param permission Permission to add\n     */\n    public void addPermission(String permission) {\n        if (!permissions.contains(permission)) {\n            permissions.add(permission);\n            System.out.println("Permission \'" + permission + "\' added for operator " + username);\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Removes a permission from the operator\'s permission list.\n     * \n     * @param permission Permission to remove\n     */\n    public void removePermission(String permission) {\n        if (permissions.contains(permission)) {\n            permissions.remove(permission);\n            System.out.println("Permission \'" + permission + "\' removed from operator " + username);\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a refreshment point to the list of points managed by this agency.\n     * \n     * @param refreshmentPointId ID of the refreshment point\n     */\n    public void addManagedRefreshmentPoint(String refreshmentPointId) {\n        if (!managedRefreshmentPoints.contains(refreshmentPointId)) {\n            managedRefreshmentPoints.add(refreshmentPointId);\n            System.out.println("Refreshment point " + refreshmentPointId + " added to managed list.");\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Removes a refreshment point from the list of points managed by this agency.\n     * \n     * @param refreshmentPointId ID of the refreshment point to remove\n     */\n    public void removeManagedRefreshmentPoint(String refreshmentPointId) {\n        managedRefreshmentPoints.remove(refreshmentPointId);\n        System.out.println("Refreshment point " + refreshmentPointId + " removed from managed list.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks if the operator can manage a specific refreshment point.\n     * \n     * @param refreshmentPointId ID of the refreshment point\n     * @return true if operator can manage the point, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean canManageRefreshmentPoint(String refreshmentPointId) {\n        // In a real application, this would involve more complex authorization logic\n        // For this simulation, we check if the point is in the managed list\n        // and if the operator has the necessary permission\n        return isLoggedIn && \n               isSessionValid() && \n               hasPermission("SELECT_REFRESHMENT_POINT") && \n               managedRefreshmentPoints.contains(refreshmentPointId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Validates if the operator is authorized to insert a banner at a refreshment point.\n     * \n     * @param refreshmentPointId ID of the refreshment point\n     * @return true if authorized, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean isAuthorizedForBannerInsertion(String refreshmentPointId) {\n        return isLoggedIn && \n               isSessionValid() && \n               hasPermission("INSERT_BANNER") && \n               canManageRefreshmentPoint(refreshmentPointId);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Simulates checking server connection for ETOUR server.\n     * \n     * @return true if connection is available, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean checkServerConnection() {\n        // In a real application, this would actually ping the server\n        // For simulation, we\'ll randomly fail 10% of the time to demonstrate error handling\n        double random = Math.random();\n        boolean connectionAvailable = random > 0.1; // 90% success rate\n        \n        if (!connectionAvailable) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted.");\n        }\n        \n        return connectionAvailable;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets the operator\'s session information.\n     * \n     * @return String containing session details\n     */\n    public String getSessionInfo() {\n        if (!isLoggedIn) {\n            return "Operator not logged in.";\n        }\n        \n        StringBuilder info = new StringBuilder();\n        info.append("Operator Session Information:\\n");\n        info.append("=============================\\n");\n        info.append("Operator ID: ").append(operatorId).append("\\n");\n        info.append("Username: ").append(username).append("\\n");\n        info.append("Agency: ").append(agencyName).append(" (ID: ").append(agencyId).append(")\\n");\n        info.append("Login Time: ").append(loginTime).append("\\n");\n        info.append("Session Status: ").append(isSessionValid() ? "Active" : "Expired").append("\\n");\n        \n        LocalDateTime now = LocalDateTime.now();\n        if (loginTime != null) {\n            long minutesLoggedIn = java.time.Duration.between(loginTime, now).toMinutes();\n            info.append("Minutes Logged In: ").append(minutesLoggedIn).append("\\n");\n            info.append("Session Timeout In: ").append(SESSION_TIMEOUT_MINUTES - minutesLoggedIn).append(" minutes\\n");\n        }\n        \n        info.append("Managed Refreshment Points: ").append(managedRefreshmentPoints.size()).append("\\n");\n        info.append("Permissions: ").append(permissions.size()).append("\\n");\n        \n        return info.toString();\n    }\n    \n    // Getters and setters\n    \n    public String getOperatorId() {\n        return operatorId;\n    }\n    \n    public String getUsername() {\n        return username;\n    }\n    \n    public void setUsername(String username) {\n        this.username = username;\n    }\n    \n    public String getAgencyName() {\n        return agencyName;\n    }\n    \n    public void setAgencyName(String agencyName) {\n        this.agencyName = agencyName;\n    }\n    \n    public String getAgencyId() {\n        return agencyId;\n    }\n    \n    public void setAgencyId(String agencyId) {\n        this.agencyId = agencyId;\n    }\n    \n    public LocalDateTime getLoginTime() {\n        return loginTime;\n    }\n    \n    public boolean isLoggedIn() {\n        return isLoggedIn;\n    }\n    \n    public List<String> getPermissions() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(permissions); // Return copy for encapsulation\n    }\n    \n    public List<String> getManagedRefreshmentPoints() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(managedRefreshmentPoints); // Return copy for encapsulation\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Returns a string representation of the agency operator.\n     * \n     * @return String containing operator details\n     */\n    @Override\n    public String toString() {\n        return "AgencyOperator{" +\n                "operatorId=\'" + operatorId + \'\\\'\' +\n                ", username=\'" + username + \'\\\'\' +\n                ", agencyName=\'" + agencyName + \'\\\'\' +\n                ", agencyId=\'" + agencyId + \'\\\'\' +\n                ", isLoggedIn=" + isLoggedIn +\n                ", sessionValid=" + isSessionValid() +\n                ", permissions=" + permissions.size() +\n                ", managedPoints=" + managedRefreshmentPoints.size() +\n                \'}\';\n    }\n}'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'I have completed task 3 by creating the AgencyOperator.java class. This class will coordinate between agency operators, refreshment points, and banner validation, implementing the main insertion flow with error handling and confirmation logic.\n\n```\npackage com.etur.insertbanner;\n\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.UUID;\nimport java.util.Scanner;\n\n/**\n * BannerManager class handles the core business logic for inserting banners.\n * Coordinates between agency operators, refreshment points, and banner validation.\n * Implements the main insertion flow with error handling and confirmation logic.\n */\npublic class BannerManager {\n    private List<RefreshmentPoint> refreshmentPoints;\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for BannerManager.\n     * Initializes with empty refreshment points list and no current operator.\n     */\n    public BannerManager() {\n        this.refreshmentPoints = new ArrayList<>();\n        this.currentOperator = null;\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Sets the current agency operator for banner operations.\n     * \n     * @param operator The logged-in agency operator\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if operator is null or not logged in\n     */\n    public void setCurrentOperator(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Operator cannot be null");\n        }\n        \n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException("Operator must be logged in");\n        }\n        \n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        System.out.println("Current operator set to: " + operator.getUsername());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a refreshment point to the manager\'s list.\n     * \n     * @param point The refreshment point to add\n     */\n    public void addRefreshmentPoint(RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        if (point != null && !refreshmentPoints.contains(point)) {\n            refreshmentPoints.add(point);\n            \n            // Also add to operator\'s managed points if operator is set\n            if (currentOperator != null) {\n                currentOperator.addManagedRefreshmentPoint(point.getId());\n            }\n            \n            System.out.println("Refreshment point added: " + point.getName());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets a list of all refreshment points available for banner insertion.\n     * \n     * @return List of refreshment points\n     */\n    public List<RefreshmentPoint> getRefreshmentPoints() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(refreshmentPoints);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Executes the main banner insertion flow according to the use case.\n     * This is the core method that implements the use case steps.\n     * \n     * @return true if banner was successfully inserted, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean executeInsertBannerFlow() {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Starting Insert Banner Use Case ===\\n");\n        \n        // Step 1: Check entry conditions\n        if (!checkEntryConditions()) {\n            System.out.println("Entry conditions not met. Cannot proceed with banner insertion.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 2: Display list of refreshment points and select one\n        RefreshmentPoint selectedPoint = selectRefreshmentPoint();\n        if (selectedPoint == null) {\n            System.out.println("No refreshment point selected. Operation cancelled.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 3: Display form for image selection and get banner data\n        Banner newBanner = getBannerDataFromUser(selectedPoint.getId());\n        if (newBanner == null) {\n            System.out.println("Banner data collection cancelled.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 4: Validate banner and check refreshment point capacity\n        if (!validateBannerAndCapacity(newBanner, selectedPoint)) {\n            System.out.println("Banner validation failed. Cannot proceed.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 5: Ask for confirmation\n        if (!askForConfirmation(newBanner, selectedPoint)) {\n            System.out.println("Insertion cancelled by operator.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 6: Insert the banner\n        boolean success = insertBanner(newBanner, selectedPoint);\n        \n        if (success) {\n            System.out.println("\\n=== Banner Insertion Completed Successfully ===\\n");\n            sendNotification(selectedPoint, newBanner);\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("\\n=== Banner Insertion Failed ===\\n");\n        }\n        \n        return success;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks the entry conditions for the use case.\n     * According to use case: "Entry Operator conditions: The agency has logged."\n     * \n     * @return true if all entry conditions are met, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean checkEntryConditions() {\n        System.out.println("Checking entry conditions...");\n        \n        // Check 1: Operator must be set and logged in\n        if (currentOperator == null) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: No agency operator is set.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        if (!currentOperator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Agency operator is not logged in.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 2: Operator session must be valid\n        if (!currentOperator.isSessionValid()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Operator session is not valid or has expired.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 3: Operator must have INSERT_BANNER permission\n        if (!currentOperator.hasPermission("INSERT_BANNER")) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Operator does not have INSERT_BANNER permission.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 4: Check server connection (ETOUR server)\n        if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 5: Must have at least one refreshment point\n        if (refreshmentPoints.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: No refreshment points available.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("All entry conditions are satisfied.");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Displays a list of refreshment points and allows the operator to select one.\n     * Implements step 1 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @return The selected refreshment point, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private RefreshmentPoint selectRefreshmentPoint() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 1: Select Refreshment Point ---");\n        System.out.println("Available refreshment points:");\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < refreshmentPoints.size(); i++) {\n            RefreshmentPoint point = refreshmentPoints.get(i);\n            System.out.printf("%d. %s - %s, %s (Banners: %d/%d)%n",\n                    i + 1,\n                    point.getName(),\n                    point.getAddress(),\n                    point.getCity(),\n                    point.getBannerCount(),\n                    point.getMaximumBanners());\n        }\n        \n        System.out.print("\\nEnter the number of the refreshment point (or 0 to cancel): ");\n        \n        try {\n            int choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine().trim());\n            \n            if (choice == 0) {\n                System.out.println("Selection cancelled by operator.");\n                return null;\n            }\n            \n            if (choice < 1 || choice > refreshmentPoints.size()) {\n                System.out.println("Invalid selection. Please try again.");\n                return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\n            }\n            \n            RefreshmentPoint selectedPoint = refreshmentPoints.get(choice - 1);\n            \n            // Check if operator can manage this refreshment point\n            if (!currentOperator.canManageRefreshmentPoint(selectedPoint.getId())) {\n                System.out.println("ERROR: You are not authorized to manage this refreshment point.");\n                return null;\n            }\n            \n            System.out.println("Selected: " + selectedPoint.getName());\n            return selectedPoint;\n            \n        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n            System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a number.");\n            return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Displays a form for image selection and collects banner data from the user.\n     * Implements steps 2-3 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param refreshmentPointId The ID of the selected refreshment point\n     * @return A Banner object with the collected data, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private Banner getBannerDataFromUser(String refreshmentPointId) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 2-3: Banner Image Selection ---");\n        \n        System.out.println("Please enter banner details:");\n        \n        // Get image name\n        System.out.print("Image file name (e.g., banner.jpg): ");\n        String imageName = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (imageName.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("Image name cannot be empty.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Get image path\n        System.out.print("Image file path (e.g., /images/banners/): ");\n        String imagePath = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (imagePath.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("Image path cannot be empty.");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Get image size\n        long imageSize = 0;\n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Image size in bytes (e.g., 204800 for 200KB): ");\n            String sizeInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                imageSize = Long.parseLong(sizeInput);\n                if (imageSize <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println("Image size must be positive.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // Get image dimensions\n        int width = 0;\n        int height = 0;\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Image width in pixels (e.g., 800): ");\n            String widthInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                width = Integer.parseInt(widthInput);\n                if (width <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println("Width must be positive.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print("Image height in pixels (e.g., 600): ");\n            String heightInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                height = Integer.parseInt(heightInput);\n                if (height <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println("Height must be positive.");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // Create banner object\n        String bannerId = UUID.randomUUID().toString();\n        Banner banner = new Banner(bannerId, imagePath, imageName, imageSize, refreshmentPointId);\n        banner.setImageDimensions(width, height);\n        \n        System.out.println("Banner data collected successfully.");\n        return banner;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Validates the banner and checks if the refreshment point has capacity.\n     * Implements step 4 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to validate\n     * @param point The refreshment point to check capacity for\n     * @return true if validation passes, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean validateBannerAndCapacity(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 4: Banner Validation and Capacity Check ---");\n        \n        // Check 1: Validate banner image\n        System.out.println("Validating banner image...");\n        if (!banner.validateImage()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Banner image validation failed.");\n            System.out.println(banner.getValidationDetails());\n            triggerErroredUseCase(banner);\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Banner image validation passed.");\n        \n        // Check 2: Check refreshment point capacity\n        System.out.println("Checking refreshment point capacity...");\n        if (point.hasReachedMaxBanners()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Refreshment point has reached maximum banner capacity.");\n            System.out.println(point.getBannerStatusSummary());\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println("Capacity check passed. " + point.getRemainingBannerSlots() + " slots available.");\n        \n        // Check 3: Verify server connection again (ETOUR server)\n        if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted during validation.");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Asks the operator for confirmation before inserting the banner.\n     * Implements part of step 4 and step 5 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to insert\n     * @param point The refreshment point where banner will be inserted\n     * @return true if operator confirms, false if cancels\n     */\n    private boolean askForConfirmation(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 5: Insertion Confirmation ---");\n        \n        System.out.println("\\nPlease review the banner details:");\n        System.out.println("Refreshment Point: " + point.getName());\n        System.out.println("Image Name: " + banner.getImageName());\n        System.out.println("Image Size: " + banner.getImageSize() + " bytes");\n        System.out.println("Image Format: " + banner.getImageFormat());\n        System.out.println("Dimensions: " + banner.getWidth() + "x" + banner.getHeight());\n        System.out.println("Current banners at point: " + point.getBannerCount() + "/" + point.getMaximumBanners());\n        \n        System.out.print("\\nDo you want to insert this banner? (yes/no): ");\n        String response = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n        \n        return response.equals("yes") || response.equals("y");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Inserts the banner into the refreshment point.\n     * Implements step 6 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to insert\n     * @param point The refreshment point where banner will be inserted\n     * @return true if insertion successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean insertBanner(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Step 6: Banner Insertion ---");\n        \n        try {\n            // Final server connection check\n            if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n                System.out.println("ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted during insertion.");\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // Insert the banner\n            boolean success = point.addBanner(banner);\n            \n            if (success) {\n                System.out.println("Banner inserted successfully!");\n                System.out.println("Banner ID: " + banner.getId());\n                System.out.println("Total banners at " + point.getName() + ": " + point.getBannerCount());\n                \n                // Remember the banner association (implicitly done by addBanner)\n                System.out.println("Banner association with refreshment point recorded.");\n                return true;\n            } else {\n                System.out.println("ERROR: Failed to insert banner. Maximum capacity may have been reached.");\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n        } catch (Exception e) {\n            System.out.println("ERROR: Unexpected error during banner insertion: " + e.getMessage());\n            e.printStackTrace();\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Triggers the Errored use case when banner validation fails.\n     * According to use case: "In the event that the inserted image is not valid, enable the use case Errored."\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner that failed validation\n     */\n    private void triggerErroredUseCase(Banner banner) {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Triggering Errored Use Case ===");\n        System.out.println("Banner validation failed for: " + banner.getImageName());\n        System.out.println("Please check the image characteristics and try again.");\n        System.out.println("Error details have been logged for administrator review.");\n        \n        // In a real application, this would trigger a separate error handling workflow\n        // For this simulation, we just log the error\n        System.out.println("ERROR LOG: Invalid banner attempted - " + banner.toString());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Sends notification about the banner insertion.\n     * According to use case: "The notification about the insertion of new banner to the Refreshments selected."\n     * \n     * @param point The refreshment point where banner was inserted\n     * @param banner The banner that was inserted\n     */\n    private void sendNotification(RefreshmentPoint point, Banner banner) {\n        System.out.println("\\n=== Sending Notification ===");\n        System.out.println("Notification sent: New banner has been inserted at " + point.getName());\n        System.out.println("Banner details: " + banner.getImageName() + " (" + banner.getImageFormat() + ")");\n        System.out.println("Refreshment point: " + point.getName() + ", " + point.getAddress());\n        System.out.println("Total banners now: " + point.getBannerCount() + "/" + point.getMaximumBanners());\n        \n        // In a real application, this would send an actual notification (email, message, etc.)\n        System.out.println("Notification has been recorded in the system.");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets a refreshment point by its ID.\n     * \n     * @param pointId The ID of the refreshment point\n     * @return The refreshment point if found, null otherwise\n     */\n    public RefreshmentPoint getRefreshmentPointById(String pointId) {\n        for (RefreshmentPoint point : refreshmentPoints) {\n            if (point.getId().equals(pointId)) {\n                return point;\n            }\n        }\n        return null;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets a summary of all refreshment points and their banner status.\n     * \n     * @return String containing summary information\n     */\n     System.out.println("\\\\n=== Starting Insert Banner Use Case ===\\\\n");\\n085|        \\n086|        // Step 1: Check entry conditions\\n087|        if (!checkEntryConditions()) {\\n088|            System.out.println("Entry conditions not met. \\n169|        // Check 5: Must have at least one refreshment point\\n170|        if (refreshmentPoints.isEmpty()) {\\n171|            System.out.println("ERROR: No refreshment points \\n179|    /**\\n180|     * Displays a list of refreshment points and allows the operator to select one.\\n181|     * Implements step 1 of the use case flow.\\n182|     * \\n183|     * @return The Please try again.");\\n212|                return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\\n213|            }\\n214|            \\n215|            RefreshmentPoint selectedPoint = refreshmentPoints.get(choice - 1);\\n216|            \\n217|            // Check if operator can manage this refreshment point\\n218|            if (!currentOperator.canManageRefreshmentPoint(selectedPoint.getId())) {\\n219|                System.out.println("ERROR: You are not authorized to manage this refreshment point.");\\n220|                return null;\\n221|            }\\n222|            \\n223|            System.out.println("Selected: " + selectedPoint.getName());\\n224|            return selectedPoint;\\n225|            \\n226|        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\\n227|            System.out.println("Invalid input. Please enter a number.");\\n228|            return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\\n229|        }\\n230|    }\\n231|    \\n232|    /**\\n233|     * Displays a form for image the core business logic for inserting banners.\n * Coordinates between agency operators, refreshment points, and banner validation.\n * Implements the main insertion flow with error handling and confirmation logic.\n */\npublic class BannerManager {\n    private List<RefreshmentPoint> refreshmentPoints;\n    private AgencyOperator currentOperator;\n    private Scanner scanner;\n    \n    /**\n     * Constructor for BannerManager.\n     * Initializes with empty refreshment points list and no current operator.\n     */\n    public BannerManager() {\n        this.refreshmentPoints = new ArrayList<>();\n        this.currentOperator = null;\n        this.scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Sets the current agency operator for banner operations.\n     * \n     * @param operator The logged-in agency operator\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if operator is null or not logged in\n     */\n    public void setCurrentOperator(AgencyOperator operator) {\n        if (operator == null) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Operator cannot be null\");\n        }\n        \n        if (!operator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            throw new IllegalStateException(\"Operator must be logged in\");\n        }\n        \n        this.currentOperator = operator;\n        System.out.println(\"Current operator set to: \" + operator.getUsername());\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Adds a refreshment point to the manager's list.\n     * \n     * @param point The refreshment point to add\n     */\n    public void addRefreshmentPoint(RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        if (point != null && !refreshmentPoints.contains(point)) {\n            refreshmentPoints.add(point);\n            \n            // Also add to operator's managed points if operator is set\n            if (currentOperator != null) {\n                currentOperator.addManagedRefreshmentPoint(point.getId());\n            }\n            \n            System.out.println(\"Refreshment point added: \" + point.getName());\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Gets a list of all refreshment points available for banner insertion.\n     * \n     * @return List of refreshment points\n     */\n    public List<RefreshmentPoint> getRefreshmentPoints() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(refreshmentPoints);\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Executes the main banner insertion flow according to the use case.\n     * This is the core method that implements the use case steps.\n     * \n     * @return true if banner was successfully inserted, false otherwise\n     */\n    public boolean executeInsertBannerFlow() {\n        System.out.println(\"\\n=== Starting Insert Banner Use Case ===\\n\");\n        \n        // Step 1: Check entry conditions\n        if (!checkEntryConditions()) {\n            System.out.println(\"Entry conditions not met. Cannot proceed with banner insertion.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 2: Display list of refreshment points and select one\n        RefreshmentPoint selectedPoint = selectRefreshmentPoint();\n        if (selectedPoint == null) {\n            System.out.println(\"No refreshment point selected. Operation cancelled.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 3: Display form for image selection and get banner data\n        Banner newBanner = getBannerDataFromUser(selectedPoint.getId());\n        if (newBanner == null) {\n            System.out.println(\"Banner data collection cancelled.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 4: Validate banner and check refreshment point capacity\n        if (!validateBannerAndCapacity(newBanner, selectedPoint)) {\n            System.out.println(\"Banner validation failed. Cannot proceed.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 5: Ask for confirmation\n        if (!askForConfirmation(newBanner, selectedPoint)) {\n            System.out.println(\"Insertion cancelled by operator.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Step 6: Insert the banner\n        boolean success = insertBanner(newBanner, selectedPoint);\n        \n        if (success) {\n            System.out.println(\"\\n=== Banner Insertion Completed Successfully ===\\n\");\n            sendNotification(selectedPoint, newBanner);\n        } else {\n            System.out.println(\"\\n=== Banner Insertion Failed ===\\n\");\n        }\n        \n        return success;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Checks the entry conditions for the use case.\n     * According to use case: \"Entry Operator conditions: The agency has logged.\"\n     * \n     * @return true if all entry conditions are met, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean checkEntryConditions() {\n        System.out.println(\"Checking entry conditions...\");\n        \n        // Check 1: Operator must be set and logged in\n        if (currentOperator == null) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: No agency operator is set.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        if (!currentOperator.isLoggedIn()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Agency operator is not logged in.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 2: Operator session must be valid\n        if (!currentOperator.isSessionValid()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Operator session is not valid or has expired.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 3: Operator must have INSERT_BANNER permission\n        if (!currentOperator.hasPermission(\"INSERT_BANNER\")) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Operator does not have INSERT_BANNER permission.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 4: Check server connection (ETOUR server)\n        if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        // Check 5: Must have at least one refreshment point\n        if (refreshmentPoints.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: No refreshment points available.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println(\"All entry conditions are satisfied.\");\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Displays a list of refreshment points and allows the operator to select one.\n     * Implements step 1 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @return The selected refreshment point, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private RefreshmentPoint selectRefreshmentPoint() {\n        System.out.println(\"\\n--- Step 1: Select Refreshment Point ---\");\n        System.out.println(\"Available refreshment points:\");\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < refreshmentPoints.size(); i++) {\n            RefreshmentPoint point = refreshmentPoints.get(i);\n            System.out.printf(\"%d. %s - %s, %s (Banners: %d/%d)%n\",\n                    i + 1,\n                    point.getName(),\n                    point.getAddress(),\n                    point.getCity(),\n                    point.getBannerCount(),\n                    point.getMaximumBanners());\n        }\n        \n        System.out.print(\"\\nEnter the number of the refreshment point (or 0 to cancel): \");\n        \n        try {\n            int choice = Integer.parseInt(scanner.nextLine().trim());\n            \n            if (choice == 0) {\n                System.out.println(\"Selection cancelled by operator.\");\n                return null;\n            }\n            \n            if (choice < 1 || choice > refreshmentPoints.size()) {\n                System.out.println(\"Invalid selection. Please try again.\");\n                return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\n            }\n            \n            RefreshmentPoint selectedPoint = refreshmentPoints.get(choice - 1);\n            \n            // Check if operator can manage this refreshment point\n            if (!currentOperator.canManageRefreshmentPoint(selectedPoint.getId())) {\n                System.out.println(\"ERROR: You are not authorized to manage this refreshment point.\");\n                return null;\n            }\n            \n            System.out.println(\"Selected: \" + selectedPoint.getName());\n            return selectedPoint;\n            \n        } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n            System.out.println(\"Invalid input. Please enter a number.\");\n            return selectRefreshmentPoint(); // Recursive call for retry\n        }\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Displays a form for image selection and collects banner data from the user.\n     * Implements steps 2-3 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param refreshmentPointId The ID of the selected refreshment point\n     * @return A Banner object with the collected data, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private Banner getBannerDataFromUser(String refreshmentPointId) {\n        System.out.println(\"\\n--- Step 2-3: Banner Image Selection ---\");\n        \n        System.out.println(\"Please enter banner details:\");\n        \n        // Get image name\n        System.out.print(\"Image file name (e.g., banner.jpg): \");\n        String imageName = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (imageName.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println(\"Image name cannot be empty.\");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Get image path\n        System.out.print(\"Image file path (e.g., /images/banners/): \");\n        String imagePath = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n        \n        if (imagePath.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println(\"Image path cannot be empty.\");\n            return null;\n        }\n        \n        // Get image size\n        long imageSize = 0;\n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print(\"Image size in bytes (e.g., 204800 for 200KB): \");\n            String sizeInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                imageSize = Long.parseLong(sizeInput);\n                if (imageSize <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println(\"Image size must be positive.\");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println(\"Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.\");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // Get image dimensions\n        int width = 0;\n        int height = 0;\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print(\"Image width in pixels (e.g., 800): \");\n            String widthInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                width = Integer.parseInt(widthInput);\n                if (width <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println(\"Width must be positive.\");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println(\"Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.\");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        while (true) {\n            System.out.print(\"Image height in pixels (e.g., 600): \");\n            String heightInput = scanner.nextLine().trim();\n            \n            try {\n                height = Integer.parseInt(heightInput);\n                if (height <= 0) {\n                    System.out.println(\"Height must be positive.\");\n                    continue;\n                }\n                break;\n            } catch (NumberFormatException e) {\n                System.out.println(\"Invalid input. Please enter a valid number.\");\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // Create banner object\n        String bannerId = UUID.randomUUID().toString();\n        Banner banner = new Banner(bannerId, imagePath, imageName, imageSize, refreshmentPointId);\n        banner.setImageDimensions(width, height);\n        \n        System.out.println(\"Banner data collected successfully.\");\n        return banner;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Validates the banner and checks if the refreshment point has capacity.\n     * Implements step 4 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to validate\n     * @param point The refreshment point to check capacity for\n     * @return true if validation passes, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean validateBannerAndCapacity(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println(\"\\n--- Step 4: Banner Validation and Capacity Check ---\");\n        \n        // Check 1: Validate banner image\n        System.out.println(\"Validating banner image...\");\n        if (!banner.validateImage()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Banner image validation failed.\");\n            System.out.println(banner.getValidationDetails());\n            triggerErroredUseCase(banner);\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println(\"Banner image validation passed.\");\n        \n        // Check 2: Check refreshment point capacity\n        System.out.println(\"Checking refreshment point capacity...\");\n        if (point.hasReachedMaxBanners()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Refreshment point has reached maximum banner capacity.\");\n            System.out.println(point.getBannerStatusSummary());\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        System.out.println(\"Capacity check passed. \" + point.getRemainingBannerSlots() + \" slots available.\");\n        \n        // Check 3: Verify server connection again (ETOUR server)\n        if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n            System.out.println(\"ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted during validation.\");\n            return false;\n        }\n        \n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Asks the operator for confirmation before inserting the banner.\n     * Implements part of step 4 and step 5 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to insert\n     * @param point The refreshment point where banner will be inserted\n     * @return true if operator confirms, false if cancels\n     */\n    private boolean askForConfirmation(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println(\"\\n--- Step 5: Insertion Confirmation ---\");\n        \n        System.out.println(\"\\nPlease review the banner details:\");\n        System.out.println(\"Refreshment Point: \" + point.getName());\n        System.out.println(\"Image Name: \" + banner.getImageName());\n        System.out.println(\"Image Size: \" + banner.getImageSize() + \" bytes\");\n        System.out.println(\"Image Format: \" + banner.getImageFormat());\n        System.out.println(\"Dimensions: \" + banner.getWidth() + \"x\" + banner.getHeight());\n        System.out.println(\"Current banners at point: \" + point.getBannerCount() + \"/\" + point.getMaximumBanners());\n        \n        System.out.print(\"\\nDo you want to insert this banner? (yes/no): \");\n        String response = scanner.nextLine().trim().toLowerCase();\n        \n        return response.equals(\"yes\") || response.equals(\"y\");\n    }\n    \n    /**\n     * Inserts the banner into the refreshment point.\n     * Implements step 6 of the use case flow.\n     * \n     * @param banner The banner to insert\n     * @param point The refreshment point where banner will be inserted\n     * @return true if insertion successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean insertBanner(Banner banner, RefreshmentPoint point) {\n        System.out.println(\"\\n--- Step 6: Banner Insertion ---\");\n        \n        try {\n            // Final server connection check\n            if (!currentOperator.checkServerConnection()) {\n                System.out.println(\"ERROR: Connection to ETOUR server interrupted during insertion.\");\n                return false;\n            }\n            \n            // Insert the banner\n            boolean success = point.addBanner(banner);\n            \n            if (success) {\n                System.out.println(\"Banner inserted successfully!\");\n                System.out.println(\"Banner ID: \" + banner.getId());\n                System.out.println(\"Total banners at \" + point.getName() + \": \" + point.getBannerCount());\n                \n                // Remember the banner association (implicitly done by addBanner)\n                System.out.println(\"Banner association with refreshment point recorded.\");\n                return true;\

> refreshmentPoints.size()) {\n                System.out.println(\"Invalid selection.
